SELECT BOARD_NO, TITLE, DETAIL, CLASS_NO, HITS, B.TRAINER_NO, TRAINER_NICKNAME, PROFILE_IMG, PAY,
TO_CHAR(UPLOAD_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24:MI:SS') AS UPLOAD_DATE,
TO_CHAR(BILLING_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24:MI:SS') AS BILLING_DATE
FROM "BOARD" B JOIN "TRAINER" T ON (B.TRAINER_NO = T.TRAINER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND CLASS_NO = #{classNo}
